glosses: bitter vetch, ervil, any plant of the species Vicia ervilia, which produces bitter, lentil-like seeds

etymology:
Inherited from Ottoman Turkish بورچاق (burçak, “vetch”), from Proto-Turkic *burčak (“bean, pea”).
Cognates
Cognate with Bashkir борсаҡ (borsaq), Chuvash пӑрҫа (părś̬a), Kazakh бұршақ (būrşaq), Kyrgyz буурчак (buurcak), Southern Altai мырчак (mïrčak), Turkmen burçak, Uyghur پۇرچاق (purchaq) and Uzbek burchoq.
